ctu_text:
pdf"}], "schemeImageUrl": "", "detailedDescription_md": "The scheme “Reimbursement of Stamp Duty and Registration Fee” is a sub scheme under “West Bengal Textile Incentive Scheme”. It was launched on 13 December, 2022, by the Department of Micro, Small and Medium Enterprises and Textiles, Government of West Bengal, and shall remain valid upto five years. 
> **Objective of the &quot;West Bengal Textile Incentive Scheme” Scheme:**

The object of the scheme is to extend fiscal incentives to textile sector across the entire value chain starting from
fibre to stitched garments for setting up such units in the State. The focus is on accelerated and focused development of the textiles sector across the state.
